form_info:
Provide the required parameter configuration settings to configure the Logstash Harvester.

Script: Provide your logstash configuration script using input and filter blocks.

Logstash Destination: Use dropdown to select HDFS or elasticsearch. Default is HDFS.

Enable Logstash Debug Logging: Sets logging to debug (trace) - more verbose. Otherwise, defaults to less verbose.

Note: only for testing purposes! Write Settings Override: Settings that control log file creation, flushing.

templateOptions.label: Enable Logstash Debug Logging In Test Mode
templateOptions.placeholder: Sets logging to debug (trace) - more verbose.  Otherwise, defaults to less verbose.

templateOptions.label: Threshold Before Segmentation
templateOptions.placeholder: Max objects to process before segmenting to a new file.

templateOptions.label: Log Flush Interval
templateOptions.placeholder: Sets the interval at which logs should be flushed.  Default setting is 300s.  Is overridden to 10s during testing for quick viewing of test logs.
